languages.text: {n}Последний двойник коварно улыбается вам.{/n} "Что же касается меня, то я — единственная наша версия, что избрала путь настоящей власти. Я служу Господину, Меняющему Пути, и в грезах его мне уже доводилось встречать свои отражения. Потому из всех нас лишь на моем лице нет этого придурковатого выражения непонимания".

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."
languages.original_text: {n}Последний двойник коварно улыбается вам.{/n} "Что же касается меня, то я — единственная наша версия, что избрала путь настоящей власти. Я служу Господину, Меняющему Пути, и в грезах его мне уже доводилось встречать свои отражения. Потому из всех нас лишь на моем лице нет этого придурковатого выражения непонимания".

I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already met my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without the dumbstruck expression on my face."

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "As for me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already met my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without the dumbstruck expression on my face."

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who elected the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without the dumbstruck expression on my face."

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who elected the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without the dumbstruck expression on my face."

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

{n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

languages.text: {n}Souriant avec une feinte timidité, votre dernier sosie répond :{/n} « En ce qui me concerne, je suis l'unique version de nous à avoir choisi la voie du véritable pouvoir. Je sers le maître, l'Architecte du Changement, et j'ai déjà croisé mes reflets dans ses rêves. Voilà pourquoi je suis {mf|le seul|la seule} à ne pas avoir l'air {mf|sidéré|sidérée}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Souriant avec une feinte timidité, votre dernier sosie répond :{/n} « En ce qui me concerne, je suis l'unique version de nous à avoir choisi la voie du véritable pouvoir. Je sers le maître, l'Architecte du Changement, et j'ai déjà croisé mes reflets dans ses rêves. Voilà pourquoi je suis {mf|le seul|la seule} à ne pas avoir l'air {mf|sidéré|sidérée}. »

languages.text: {n}La última copia sonríe taimadamente.{/n} «En cuanto a mí, soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} de nosotr{mf|o|a}s que ha elegido el camino del poder verdadero. Sirvo a mi señor, El Que Cambia las Cosas, y ya me he enfrentado a mis reflejos en sus sueños. Por eso soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} de l{mf|o|a}s presentes que no tiene cara de pasmarote».
languages.original_text: {n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}La última copia sonríe taimadamente.{/n} «En cuanto a mí, soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} de nosotr{mf|o|a}s que ha elegido el camino del poder verdadero. Sirvo a mi señor, El Que Cambia las Cosas, y ya me he enfrentado a mis reflejos en sus sueños. Por eso soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} de l{mf|o|a}s presentes que no tiene cara de pasmarote».

languages.text: {n}最后这位复制人高傲地笑了起来。{/n}“至于我嘛，只有我选择的道路通往真正的力量。我侍奉我的主人，诡道之主。在他的梦境之中，我早就见到过我的倒影。正因如此，在所有人之中，只有我看起来一点都不惊讶。”
languages.original_text: {n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}最后这位复制人高傲地笑了起来。{/n}“至于我嘛，只有我的道路通往真正的力量。我侍奉我的主人，诡道之主。在他的梦境之中，我早就见到过我的倒影。正因如此，在所有人之中，只有我看起来一点都不惊讶。”

languages.text: {n}最後のドッペルゲンガーは、いたずらっぽく微笑んだ。{/n}「私は、真なる力への道を選んだ唯一の者だ。私は主である『方途を違える者』に仕えており、私は既に、主の夢の中で自分の鏡像をぐうぜん見つけたのだ。ゆえに私だけが、この状況に呆然としていないというわけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}最後のドッペルゲンガーは、いたずらっぽく微笑んだ。{/n}「私は、真なる力への道を選んだ唯一の者だ。私は主である『方途を違える者』に仕えており、私は既に、主の夢の中で自分の鏡像をぐうぜん見つけたのだ。ゆえに私だけが、この状況に呆然としていないというわけだ」

languages.text: {n}{mf|Der letzte Doppelgänger|Die letzte Doppelgängerin} lächelt scheu.{/n} "Wo wir gerade von mir sprechen, ich bin die einzige Version unserer selbst, die den Pfad zu wahrer Macht gewählt hat. Ich diene dem Meister, dem Wandler der Wege, und ich habe mein Spiegelbild bereits in seinen Träumen getroffen. Deswegen gucke auch nur ich nicht völlig verdattert aus der Wäsche."
languages.original_text: {n}The last doppelganger smiles coyly.{/n} "Speaking of me, I am the only version of ourselves who chose the path to true power. I serve the Master, the Changer of Ways, and I already chanced upon my reflections in his dreams. Which is why I am the only one without a dumbstruck expression on my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Der letzte Doppelgänger|Die letzte Doppelgängerin} lächelt scheu.{/n} "Wo wir gerade von mir sprechen, ich bin die einzige Version unserer selbst, die den Pfad zu wahrer Macht gewählt hat. Ich diene dem Meister, dem Wandler der Wege, und ich habe mein Spiegelbild bereits in seinen Träumen getroffen. Deswegen gucke auch nur ich nicht völlig verdattert aus der Wäsche."
